title: DSA Level 6 â€” Trees & Binary Trees
intro: This level covers tree basics and binary tree traversal techniques.
points: Understand the basic terminology of trees: root, child, leaf, height, depth.
Learn the structure of a binary tree node (data, left, right).
Implement and understand preorder, inorder, and postorder traversals.
Use recursion to traverse trees effectively.
Visualize tree traversals on simple diagrams.
